name: hook0
description: Hook0 is a self hosted webhook service that centralizes outbound webhooks for your applications. It offers event routing, retries and history, along with a clear web UI and API for managing subscriber endpoints securely.
features: Webhook Management: Centralize all outbound webhooks from your applications in one service.
Event Routing: Route events to multiple subscriber endpoints based on event types.
Automatic Retries: Retry failed webhook deliveries with exponential backoff.
Delivery History: Track all webhook attempts with timestamps and response codes.
Endpoint Management: Add, remove, and configure subscriber endpoints through web UI or API.
Payload Transformation: Transform event payloads before delivery to subscribers.
Security Features: Sign webhooks with HMAC signatures for verification.
Rate Limiting: Control delivery rates to prevent overwhelming subscriber endpoints.
